summary: 26 years of experience in the Engineering and Construction fields with 8 years of project management. Sustainable design experience from conceptualization to building occupancy. Diverse client profile including Medical, Research & Development, Commercial, Educational and Industrial. A competent Project Engineer with strong communication, organisation and co-ordination skills; proven track record of delivering projects on time and within budget while ensuring safety and quality throughout the life cycle.

experience.title: Sales Engineer
experience.description: Responsible for sales engineering including ensuring H&S compliance, resolving complex technical issues, assessing financial feasibility of budget items and alternatives; development of proposals and estimates for conceptual designs, project schedules and budgets; manage construction from mobilization to owner sign-off; conduct field observations, material/equipment acquisition and personnel allocation; ensure engineering work complies with specifications, laws and contractual requirements; oversee safety, operability and maintainability; manage projects from conception to completion; provide technical support to project teams; oversee contract review and execution; manage budgets and cost control; maintain post-completion documentation; produce test plans and reports; procure materials and services; evaluate tenders; liaise with clients to ensure design and manufacture to budgets and timeframes.

experience.title: Project Manager/Construction Manager
experience.description: Led and organized client conceptual development of construction projects; developed project scope and specifications for mechanical system replacements; mentored staff and managed overall project execution; developed RFPs, schedules and budgets; oversaw installation to completion. Notable accomplishments: project value delivered on time; Enon Field Conversion & Water Damage Remediation; Grace Baptist Church Sanctuary A/C & Boiler Plant.

experience.title: Project Manager/Project Engineer
experience.description: Developed and managed project scopes, schedules and budgets; mentored staff and managed overall project execution; conducted interdisciplinary coordination with architects, consultants and vendors; developed energy audits, master planning and designed mechanical systems including preliminary and working drawings and specifications for sustainable projects; responsible for work assignments and man-hour expenditures; primary interface with client, contractors, architects, and vendors.

experience.title: Project Manager & Project Engineer
experience.description: Achieved LEED Platinum certification from the Green Building Council for an office renovation; performed energy cost analysis of geothermal system for the Friends Center Renovation Project.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Provided project engineering support including coordination with design teams, preparation of mechanical drawings and specifications for sustainable projects; contributed to energy audits and coordination with contractors and vendors.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Supported mechanical system design and coordination; contributed to energy audits, master planning and development of drawings and specifications; collaborated with architects and consultants to ensure project requirements.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Assisted in engineering project design and coordination; contributed to development of mechanical drawings and project documentation.

experience.title: Project Designer/Shop Drawing Clerk
experience.description: Created shop drawings and supported project design activities; collaborated with engineering team to produce working drawings and specifications.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

certifications: LEED Platinum (Leadership in Energy & Environmental Design)
